Name: LLP022 Clear Address
Output_template:
{"systemID":"59a4f21090a7f","systemName":"Firmstep Solutions Read","lookup_validation":"0","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes","query":"select
	'' as uprn_selected,
	{postcode_search_after} as postcode_search,
	IF({uprn_selected}='Entered',1,'') as Address_Found,
	'' as flat_out,
	'' as house_out,
	'' as street_out,
	'' as town_out, 
	'' as postcode_out5,
	'' as zIPPostcode,
	'' as country_out"}
